creator: matthew.harrison@inpharmatica.co.uk
text:
While the checksum task now works with filesets in 1.6.1 (over 1.5.1) (many thanks)
it still does not work within conditions as documented in the manual, example 8.
(the property is never set, whether the checksums match or not)


workaround: use <and> with a <checksum/> for each file you want to test

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
it is hard to say when exactly this was fixed, in any case it works in Ant 1.7.1.

svn revision 728016 contains a unit test that passes with both trunk and Ant 1.7.1.
